markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 6"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Cassisian Helmet](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2333)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 151 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 225 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn headwear

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A small, feathered wing is attached to either side of this ornate brass helmet. A visor on the front lowers to cover your face. While wearing the _cassisian helmet_, you gain a +1 status bonus to AC and saves against evil creatures and effects.

<document level="2" id="action-1888" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Cassisian Helmet
